messages.content: Summarize my top three repositories ([repo1], [repo2], [repo3]) in a way that inspires potential sponsors to support my work.

usage_example.python:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI()

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="gpt-4o",
    max_tokens=4096,
    messages=[
        {"role": "system", "content": """Summarize my top three repositories ([repo1], [repo2], [repo3]) in a way that inspires potential spo..."""},
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
